name: Delights of Wondrous Wanderings
effect: Restores 30–34% of Max HP and an additional 600–1,900 HP to the selected character.
description: A dessert box based on the recipes of several different companions, simply overflowing with heartfelt intentions. Neatly arranged rows of delicate pastries line the box — but what will this goodwill gesture taste like?

suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.
suspicious.description: A dessert box based on the recipes of several different companions, simply overflowing with heartfelt intentions. There's nothing wrong with the structure itself, but you smell a strange disharmony in its scents... You are apprehensive about giving it a go. Hmm, could it work as a memento instead?

normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.
normal.description: A dessert box based on the recipes of several different companions, simply overflowing with heartfelt intentions. Neatly arranged rows of delicate pastries line the box — but what will this goodwill gesture taste like?

delicious.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.
delicious.description: A dessert box based on the recipes of several different companions, simply overflowing with heartfelt intentions. The artisanry here is akin to the exquisite scene of the moon cutting through the clouds. Indeed, you can barely bear to eat such a precious gift.
